text: Buena Vista is a plantation with a historic mansion located about southeast of Stonewall, Louisiana, U.S.. It was built in 1859 for Boykin Witherspoon by M. Robbins. with three photos and two maps With . The house has been listed on the National Register of Historic Places on January 19, 1989. ==See also== *National Register of Historic Places listings in DeSoto Parish, Louisiana ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Louisiana Category:Greek Revival architecture in Louisiana Category:Gothic Revival architecture in Louisiana Category:Houses completed in 1859 Category:Buildings and structures in DeSoto Parish, Louisiana Category:Plantations in Louisiana
title: Buena Vista (Stonewall, Louisiana)
